prototypes.name: Life is a Coin-Toss
prototypes.description: Flip a coin every year of your life to see if you get money or experience. Make choices based on the outcomes. Can you live your best life?

prototypes.name: Hex Map Explorer
prototypes.description: You have little food left, explore for resources, and try to rebuild society

prototypes.name: Daily Word Blocks
prototypes.description: A simple word-search daily puzzle, can you clear the whole grid? share to challenge your friends!

prototypes.name: Poker PVP
prototypes.description: Play poker against a computer, best of 3 wins!

prototypes.name: Jack Adventure
prototypes.description: A dungeon crawler with blackjack-based combat. Charge to draw cards, attack to deal damage. Clear 10 encounters to win!

prototypes.name: Combat System Range
prototypes.description: Test weapon damage, spread, and reload balance on a shooting range target.
